name: market for concrete, 45MPa | concrete, 45MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21354/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'concrete, 45MPa', in the Global geography.;In this market, expert judgement was used to develop product specific transport distance estimations.;The product "concrete, 45MPa" represents South African 45MPa ready-mix and high-strength concrete. Density: 2,260 kg/m³. The composition of concrete (for 1 m³) contains: Portland fly ash cement 464 kg, Water 147 kg, Gravel 1050kg, Sand 746 kg, Admixtures (air-entrainers and superplastisizers) 4.63kg. This product is used for suspended structural beams and slabs, and pre-cast items such as flagstones and heavy-duty floors such as workshop floors. Megapascal (MPa) is a measure of the compressive strength of concrete (N/mm2). MPa informs of how much pressure can be applied to the concrete product before it cracks or fails.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

exchanges.description: Transport distance based on US BTS Commodity Flow Surveys 1993, 1997, 2002, 2007, US Dep. Of Transportation, Bureau of Transportation Statistics. Of the total road transport, 6% is assumed to be by delivery van for goods with a large share of retail sale, and 3% for goods that are mainly sold via wholesale.
